name: Siebel: Avoid inactive elements in an Applet
description: This rule reports Applets containing inactive elements
output:
This rule reports Applets containing inactive elements. It reports:
- Applet full name
- the associated values are the references to the elements set to inactive
rationale: Inactive elements may be the symptom of Dead Code. And dead Code must be avoided as it makes source code less readable and increases the cost of the software maintenance.
remediation:
Check if the inactive element is truly unnecessary.
Remove it if so.
total: Number of added or modified applets
alternativeName: Siebel: Avoid inactive elements in an Applet
